script_phases.name: Build CodableWrapper macro plugin
script_phases.script:
arch=$(sysctl -n machdep.cpu.brand_string)

    result=""
    if [[ "$arch" == *"Apple"* ]]; then
      result="arm64"
    else
      result="x86_64"
    fi

    codable_path="${PODS_BUILD_DIR}/CodableWrapper"
    release_path="$codable_path/release"
    tool_path="CodableWrapperMacros-tool"
    target_binary="$release_path/CodableWrapperMacros"

    env -i PATH="$PATH" "$SHELL" -l -c "arch -$result swift build -c release --package-path '$PODS_TARGET_SRCROOT' --build-path '$codable_path'"

    if [ -f "$release_path/$tool_path" ] && [ ! -f $target_binary ]
    then
        cp "$release_path/$tool_path" $target_binary
    fi
